1: <pb/>A yet max lajwi ec' jun ilya' tol chi cam anima yuj tu', max yalon Jehová bay cham Moisés c'al bay cham sat sacerdote Eleazar, is c'ajol Aarón:
2: <pb/>Iaj is bisil eb israel yin junjun makanil yayji eb, chi el yich yin eb tol 20 abil is k'inal tol tiempo wal toj yin owal, ẍi Jehová.
3: <pb/>Max wajban oc cham Moisés yetok Eleazar masanil eb winak bay yac'alil Moab, bay is ti a' Jordán, bay sataktok Jericó,
4: yet chi tz'ibelay masanil eb 20 abil is k'inal chi beyc'altok, axca wal max yun yalon Jehová bay cham Moisés. <pb/>A ton masanil eb max eltek bay Egipto:
5: <pb/>A eb is c'ajol Rubén is babel c'ajol cham Israel, a ton eb chi binaj can yin is yinatil: Enoc, Falú,
7: axa is bisil yinatil eb ti' ay 43,730 eb winak yin masanil.
8: A Falú, a' ay is c'ajol Eliab;
9: axa pax Eliab a' ay is c'ajol Nemuel, Datán c'al Abiram. A Datán yetok Abiram tu' yicham winakil conob yayji eb. A ton eb junej yayji is lajk'anej yetok Coré. Max meltzoj oc eb ajc'ulal yin Jehová, yin cham Moisés c'al yin cham Aarón.
10: Palta max jak tx'otx' tx'otx' is ti' cax max turlay aytok eb cawan tu' yetokc'al Coré. Masanil eb max tzakloj yintak Coré tu' max cami, a ton 250 eb winak max cam yuj k'ak'ej. A juntzan tu' max oc tx'oxbanilejal bay eb israel masanil.
11: Axa pax eb is yinatil Coré xin, maj cam eb.
12: <pb/>Axa pax eb c'ajol Simeón xin, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Nemuel, Jamín, Jaquín,
14: Axa is bisil eb yinatil eb ti', ay 22,200 eb winak yin masanil.
15: <pb/>A eb is c'ajol Gad chi binajcan yin yinatil, a ton eb ti': Zefón, Hagui, Zuni,
18: Axa is bisil eb yinatil eb ti', ay 40,500 eb winak yin masanil.
19: <pb/>A pax eb c'ajol Judá max cam bay tx'otx' Canaán a ton Er c'al Onán.
20: A eb c'ajol Judá chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Sela, Fares c'al Zara.
21: A eb c'ajol Fares, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Hezrón c'al Hamul.
22: Axa is bisil eb yinatil Judá, ay 76,500 eb winak yin masanil.
23: <pb/>A eb c'ajol Isacar, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Tola, Fúa,
25: Axa is bisil eb yinatil eb ti' 64,300 eb winak yin masanil.
26: <pb/>A eb c'ajol Zabulón, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Sered, Elón c'al Jahleel.
27: Axa is bisil eb yinatil eb ti' ay 60,500 eb winak yin masanil.
28: <pb/>Axa pax yin yinatil José, cab tribual max yunej, a ton Manasés c'al Efraín.
29: A is c'ajol Manasés, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Maquir, is mam Galaad.
30: Axa eb is c'ajol Galaad, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Jezer, Helec,
33: (A Zelofehad is c'ajol Hefer, c'amc'al is c'ajol, asan is cutz'in ay, a ton Maala, Noa, Hogla, Milca c'al Tirsa.)
34: Axa bisil eb yinatil Manasés ay 52,700 eb winak yin masanil.
35: Axa eb is c'ajol Efraín, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Sutela, Bequer c'al Tahán.
36: Ay jun is c'ajol Sutela chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Erán.
37: Axa is bisil eb yinatil Efraín, ay 32,500 eb winak yin masanil.
38: <pb/>A eb is c'ajol Benjamín, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Bela, Asbel, Ahiram,
40: A eb c'ajol Bela, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Ard, c'al Naamán.
41: Axa is bisil eb yinatil Benjamín 45,600 eb winak yin masanil.
42: <pb/>A pax is c'ajol Dan chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Suham.
43: Axa is bisil eb yinatil Suham ay 64,400 eb winak yin masanil.
44: <pb/>A pax eb is c'ajol Aser, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Imna, Isúi, c'al Bería.
45: A is c'ajol Bería, chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Heber, c'al Malquiel.
46: (A Aser tu' ay jun is cutz'in chi yik Sera.)
47: Axa is bisil eb yinatil Aser tu' ay 53,400 eb winak yin masanil.
48: <pb/>A eb is c'ajol Neftalí chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Jahzeel, Guni,
50: Axa is bisil eb yinatil Neftalí ay 45,400 eb winak yin masanil.
51: <pb/>Yuj tu' xan a is bisil masanil eb winak yet Israel ay 601,730.
52: <pb/>Max k'anjab Jehová bay cham Moisés, max yaloni:
53: <pb/>Chi pojlay ec' tx'otx' tx'otx' xol masanil tribu atac'ala' jantak is bisil junjun max aji.
54: Yin suerteal chi yun pojlay ec' tx'otx' xol eb. Miman tx'otx' chak' bay mac xiwil bisil, txennej tx'otx' chak' bay mac txennej is bisil, ẍi Jehová.
57: <pb/>Eb c'ajol Leví chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Gersón, Coat c'al Merari.
58: A eb yitxiquin Leví tu', chi binajcan yin is yinatil, a ton Libni, Hebrón, Mahli, Musi, c'al Coré a ton eb tu' yinatil Leví. <pb/>A Coat tu' a ton is mam Amram.
59: A Amram tu' max mojay yetok jun ix yinatil Leví, a ton ix chi yik Jocabed. A yet ayic' Leví tu' bay Egipto max alji ix. A Amram yetok Jocabed a ton eb is mam c'al is txutx Aarón yetok Moisés c'al María.
60: Axa eb c'ajol Aarón xin, a ton Nadab, Abiú, Eleazar c'al Itamar.
61: A Nadab c'al Abiú max cam eb yet max yak'on eb jun k'ak' tol tx'ok yeli, bay Jehová.
62: <pb/>A masanil eb winak yin yinatil Leví, a ton eb yin jun xajaw is k'inal chi beyc'altok, ay 23,000. A eb ti' c'am oc eb bisilok juntzanxa eb yet israelal, yujtol a eb levita tu' c'am is satak eb max yi' yetok juntzanxa tribual tu'.
63: <pb/>Caywal tu' max yun yeloc is bisil eb israel max ilay aj yuj cham Moisés yetok cham sacerdote Eleazar bay ac'al Moab, bay ti' a' Jordán bay satak Jericó.
64: A masanil eb tu', c'am junok eb max bislay yuj cham Moisés c'al cham Aarón yet max yion aj eb cham is bisil eb yet babelal bay takin tx'otx' Sinaí.
65: Yujtol max yal Jehová tol ok cam eb bay takin tx'otx', c'amxa junok eb tu' maxto cani; asanxanej Caleb is c'ajol Jefone, yetok Josué is c'ajol Nun max cani.
